resource.description: Unspecified vulnerability in 7-zip before 4.5.7 has unknown impact and remote attack vectors, as demonstrated by the PROTOS GENOME test suite for Archive Formats (c10).
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2008-6536: Unspecified vulnerability in 7-zip before 4.5.7

resource.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the NArchive::NHfs::CHandler::ExtractZlibFile method in 7zip before 16.00 and p7zip allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted HFS+ image.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2016-2334: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability

resource.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in 7 Zip for Windows 16.02 and earlier allows remote attackers to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2016-7804: Untrusted search path vulnerability

resource.description: A null pointer dereference bug affects the 16.02 and many old versions of p7zip. A lack of null pointer check for the variable folders.PackPositions in function CInArchive::ReadAndDecodePackedStreams in CPP/7zip/Archive/7z/7zIn.cpp, as used in the 7z.so library and in 7z applications, will cause a crash and a denial of service when decoding malformed 7z files.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2016-9296: Null pointer dereference bug

resource.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the NCompress::NShrink::CDecoder::CodeReal method in 7-Zip before 18.00 and p7zip allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) or potentially execute arbitrary code via a crafted ZIP archive.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2017-17969: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability

resource.description: Incorrect initialization logic of RAR decoder objects in 7-Zip 18.03 and before can lead to usage of uninitialized memory, allowing remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted RAR archive.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2018-10115: Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution vuln via crafted RAR archive

resource.description: 7-Zip through 18.01 on Windows implements the "Large memory pages" option by calling the LsaAddAccountRights function to add the SeLockMemoryPrivilege privilege to the user's account, which makes it easier for attackers to bypass intended access restrictions by using this privilege in the context of a sandboxed process.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2018-10172: Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution vuln via crafted RAR archive

resource.description: Insufficient exception handling in the method NCompress::NRar3::CDecoder::Code of 7-Zip before 18.00 and p7zip can lead to multiple memory corruptions within the PPMd code, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) or execute arbitrary code via a crafted RAR archive.
resource.title: 7-Zip: CVE-2018-5996: Denial of Service and Remote Code Execution vuln via crafted RAR archive

resource.description: Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Acrobat and Reader for Windows and Macintosh. These updates addresscriticalvulnerabilities that could potentially allow an attacker to take control of the affected system.
resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB17-36: 安全更新可用于 Adobe Acrobat 和 Reader | APSB17-36

resource.description: Windows和OS X系统上的Adobe Reader及Acrobat 11.0.14之前版本,Acrobat及Acrobat Reader DC Classic 15.006.30119之前版本以及Acrobat和Acrobat Reader DC Continuous 15.010.20056之前版本可允许攻击者通过制作的文件附件注释来执行任意代码或导致拒绝服务(内存破坏)，此漏洞与CVE-2016-0933,CVE-2016-0936,CVE-2016-0938,CVE-2016-0939,CVE-2016-0942,CVE-2016-0944,CVE-2016-0945及CVE-2016-0946等漏洞均不同。
resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB16-02 (CVE-2016-0931): 适用于Adobe Acrobat和Reader的安全更新

resource.description: Adobe Reader和Acrobat的11.0.14之前版本，Acrobat和Acrobat Reader DC Classic的15.006.30119之前版本，Windows及OS X版Acrobat和Acrobat Reader DC Continuous 15.010.20056之前版本，Doc对象实现中的释放后使用漏洞允许攻击者通过未指定的向量执行任意代码，与这几个漏洞不同：CVE-2016-0934, CVE-2016-0937, CVE-2016-0940, CVE-2016-0941。
resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB16-02 (CVE-2016-0932): 适用于Adobe Acrobat和Reader的安全更新

resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB16-02 (CVE-2016-0933): 适用于Adobe Acrobat和Reader的安全更新

resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB16-02 (CVE-2016-0934): 适用于Adobe Acrobat和Reader的安全更新

resource.description: Windows和OS X系统上Adobe Reader和Acrobat 11.0.14之前版本, Acrobat和Acrobat Reader DC Classic 15.006.30119之前版本和Acrobat和Acrobat Reader DC Continuous 15.010.20056之前版本存在双重释放漏洞。攻击者可通过特制的ExtGState词典执行任意代码。
resource.title: Adobe Acrobat: APSB16-02 (CVE-2016-0935): 适用于Adobe Acrobat和Reader的安全更新
